title: BTS and the Staggering Human Costs of Conscription

media:group.media:title: BTS and the Staggering Human Costs of Conscription
media:group.media:description:
If you haven’t heard of “BTS” by now, they’re an internationally famous boy band from South Korea. Despite comprising 1/13 of South Korea’s tourism industry and producing $4.7 billion for their economy, the group might be halted for a few years. Why exactly? Watch this FEE short to find out. 
——————————
CREDITS:

Narrated by Matt Tabor
